description: The artist Edmund de Wall is preparing for his first exhibition in the United States.
title: Hands and Clay
title_page: Hands and Clay - The New York Times
text:
The artist Edmund de Waal at his studio in an old munitions factory in Dulwich, an area of South London. He produces objects like wafer-thin cylinders, plates and pitchers, all carefully arranged to tell a story.
A major show of his porcelain opens on Sept. 12 at Larry Gagosianâ€™s Madison Avenue gallery in New York.
